attributes.action: ensure the safety of British citizens whilst attending football grounds in Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is apparent that there is an injustice in the current system of policing visiting foreign football fans in Europe. British fans are to be escorted by English police who will be responsible for their safety and will act as independent observers of the conduct of European law enforcement officers around and within football stadiums.
